articles.author: Lisa Richwine
articles.title: Shannen Doherty, '90210' and 'Charmed' actress, dies at 53 - Reuters
articles.description: American actor Shannen Doherty, best known for her role as high school student Brenda Walsh on hit 1990s television drama "Beverly Hills, 90210," has died at age 53 following a years-long battle with cancer.

articles.author: Michaela Zee
articles.title: James Sikking, ‘Hill Street Blues’ and ‘Doogie Howser, M.D.’ Star, Dies at 90 - Variety
articles.description: James B. Sikking, an actor known for 'Hill Street Blues' and 'Doogie Howser, M.D.,' has died. He was 90.
articles.content:
James B. Sikking, known for his roles as Lt. Howard Hunter on “Hill Street Blues” and the titular character’s father on “Doogie Howser, M.D.,” has died. He was 90. 
Sikking died Saturday of complica… [+2249 chars]

articles.description: While everyone else is raising armies and rounding up dragons, Mysaria is fighting the battle of hot gossip, landing her at the top of this week’s HOTD Scorecard.
articles.content:
The House of the Dragon Scorecard is an accounting of the events of this weeks episode, in which points are awarded to characters on a scale of 0 to 10. Points will be awarded for any or no reason.
